DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine accuracy non-invasive assessment LVEDP use investigational device C.A 2.0 .
DOC.brief_title: Correlation Non-invasive Assessment , Using C.A 2.0 Device , Versus Invasive Assessment LVEDP
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male subject age 18 80 year postmenopausal female 80 year age 2 . Patient undergoing elective cardiac catheterization LVED aortic pressure record 3 . Willing able sign inform consent prior study initiation 1 . Subject baseline heart rate < 60 > 100 beats/min 2 . Subject moderate severe valvular disease 3 . Subject suffers atrial fibrillation tachyarrhythmias 4 . Subject suffers hemodynamic instability 5 . Subject candidate primary PCI
